settings.title: Give a Little. Change a Lot.

settings.editor: Education is our top priority. Find out how can you contribute.
We plan to increase the number of food that we are providing from 11k to 20k.
We are accepting second-hand clothes in good shape or money donation.

Your donation is the biggest part of our budget and makes a huge difference in the lives of these African children. Each donations matter, even the smallest ones. Donate $2( average price of coffee in the USA) and someone's life will get better!
Donate to rebuild central School in Cape-Town.
Donate to provide food and water supplies for children in Africa.
Donate to help us buy books and etc for kids who can't afford it

settings.title: Join hands with us for a better life and beautiful future.

settings.editor: All donations will go to support 3 main problems: food, education, health. Our project is working with troubled kids in Africa more than 5 years and we've achieved great successes.
Each donations matter, even the smallest ones. Donate $2( average price of coffee in the USA) and someone's life will get better!
